meanings.definition: Containing nuts or resembling nuts in flavor or texture.
meanings.sent1: The nuttier cookies had a delicious crunch.
meanings.sent2: The nuttier trail mix was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent3: She joked that the nuttier salad was so nutty, it could tell jokes.
meanings.sent4: The nuttier granola bar was a treasure trove of nuttiness.
meanings.sent5: The nuttier ice cream was a nut-lover's dream come true.

meanings.sent1: His nuttier ideas always surprised us.
meanings.sent2: The nuttier professor was known for his wild theories.
meanings.sent3: The nuttier squirrel in the park danced to its own beat.
meanings.sent4: Her nuttier antics made everyone smile.
meanings.sent5: The nuttier clown at the circus made the children laugh.
